content: The **Singapore women's national under-18 basketball team** is a national [basketball](/wiki/Basketball) team of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), administered by the [Basketball Association of Singapore](/wiki/Basketball_Association_of_Singapore). It represents the country in international under-18 women's basketball competitions. ## [FIBA Under-18 Women's Asia Cup](/wiki/FIBA_Under-18_Women%27s_Asia_Cup) participations YearDivision ADivision B(/wiki/1984_ABC_Under-18_Championship_for_Women)5th(/wiki/1989_ABC_Under-18_Championship_for_Women)8th(/wiki/2004_FIBA_Asia_Under-18_Championship_for_Women)6th(/wiki/2007_FIBA_Asia_Under-18_Championship_for_Women)5th(/wiki/2008_FIBA_Asia_Under-18_Championship_for_Women)12th(/wiki/2012_FIBA_Asia_Under-18_Championship_for_Women)10th(/wiki/2016_FIBA_Asia_Under-18_Championship_for_Women)11th(/wiki/2018_FIBA_U18_Women%27s_Asian_Championship#Division_B)6th - [Singapore women's national basketball team](/wiki/Singapore_women%27s_national_basketball_team) - [Singapore women's national under-16 basketball team](/wiki/Singapore_women%27s_national_under-16_basketball_team) - [Singapore men's national under-18 basketball team](/wiki/Singapore_men%27s_national_under-18_basketball_team) - Archived records of Singapore team participations This article about a national basketball team is a stub. title: Singapore women's national under-18 basketball team
